column4: Hi! I want to your generic user's views about Ubuntu 10.10 on atom processor. One of my friend installed and he is facing lot of issues at boot time (manual enter button press needed multiple times), slugishness in display etc
alos the boot time is very long
although I was expecting it to be around 10 seconds to dsktop
Atom processor? Avoid metapackages. Install things as you go. Install minimal and keep it minimal.
